experiences.title: AI researcher
experiences.subtitle: Institut Pascal - University Clermont Auvergne
workDescription: Explored and implemented the integration of LLMs into 3D Slicer.
Trained deep learning models on multi-GPU setups.
Developed a 3D Slicer extension embedding the trained model.
Work considered for publication in the Journal of Open Source Software.
